# constraints

**Instance Property**

Returns the constraints held by the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var constraints: [NSLayoutConstraint] { get }
```

## Return Value

The constraints held by the view.

## Managing the View’s Constraints

- **addConstraint(_:)**: Adds a constraint on the layout of the receiving view or its subviews.
- **addConstraints(_:)**: Adds multiple constraints on the layout of the receiving view or its subviews.
- **removeConstraint(_:)**: Removes the specified constraint from the view.
- **removeConstraints(_:)**: Removes the specified constraints from the view.
